README eyethink physiological synchrony

2024-01-23

Eyethink: Physiological Data and Synchrony Analysis

This is a toolbox for processing data from emotibit sensors, labelling/linking the it with behavioural data from gorilla, and running cross recurrence analysis. It is part of the eyethink toolbox and requires the eyethinkdata package.

Use the code below to install or update from github

devtools::install_github("dcr-eyethink/eyethinkphysiosync")
library(eyethinkphysiosync)

There is a vignette walk through using the package and some of its functions. You can access this in R with

vignette("eyethinkphysiosync_vignette",package = "eyethinkphysiosync")

You can also read this vignette online at the github website.
